Uses of Class
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.convert.DirectConverter

Packages that use DirectConverter
Package
Description
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.convert
Standard type conversion tools for the case in which the input types are the standard Java types already supported by the ValuesWriter interface.

  • Uses of DirectConverter in org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.convert

    ConvertStringToBoolean
    Convert a VARCHAR column to an BIT column following the Java rules for parsing Boolean values, then using 1 if the boolean is true, 0 if false.
